knimeNode.name: PDB Loader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Load a local copy of a PDB files from a column of source filepaths or URLs

fullDescription.intro:
Loads PDB files specified by a valid full file path or URL into a table.
Files may be local or remote, as long as the URL is accessible.
Only paths ending .pdb or .pdb.gz will be loaded. The resulting column will be cast as PDBCells.
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK). For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

option.name: Select a column contaning the PDB paths

fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the file paths or URLs
Enter name of column for PDB cells

ports.inPort: Input table containing paths or URLs to pdb files to load
ports.outPort: Output table with pdb files loaded
